name: SuperBootGenPLG
description:
Provides a netless way to create "not-only" sub-springboot-module,

associate poms'relation automatically. Trying to manage sb project.


SuperBootGenPLG [chain-gen]


GitHub | Issues

- maven based version

- TODO: more extensibility, simplify everything


CreateSubSpringBootModule

- provide the way to create sub-springboot-module without spring.io

- automatically associate poms'relationship between targeted parent & new sub module

- support mybatis plus CodeGen template, since 3.2 support DIY all the templates

QA

1 Q:Direct parent do not relay spring-boot-starter-parent, hows it work?

- A:We jz focus on create sub module, think about multi-layer structure project

2 Q:Dependencies management?

- A:idea's guide is powerful, crawler or func-like guide wont be consider temporarily, live template recommend.

3 Q:Input validate?

- A:Validation is quite simple plus some tips, take it easy for normal use, all of them are under ur ctrl

4 Q:How to avoid duplication of module name?

- A:Only validate under same dir, so be careful

5 Q:Application name?

- A:If a new module named aaa-bbb_ccc, then its application name is AaaBbbCccApplication by default ftl

6 Q:H to DIY ftl?

- A:[application.ftl, applicationTest.ftl, mybatisPlus.ftl] is needed, [mybatisPlusProperties.ftl] is optional. Vars' name already determined by plugin, u could get default ftl on github or this opensource plugin jar(zip), if [mybatisPlusProperties.ftl] is missing, sbg-mpg.properties wont be created. sbg-mpg.properties is a datasource settings file for used-once-for-codegen-then-delete, plugin wont validate ur ftl, if u decided to use ur ftl put them ALL(bundle) under same dir then choose this dir, this feature make 3.2 be 3.2 bate


ConvertMavenToSpringBoot

- convert init-like maven project to single or agg springboot project as u like

- support persist 3 spring-boot-starter-parent's versions.

- support mybatis plus CodeGen template, since 3.2 support DIY all the templates

QA

1 Q:Why write this action? for what

- A:if theres no internet, or jz wanna create for dome or use this like a shortcut, have a try

2 Q:How could I choose spring version?

- A:On springboot version clipboard, it helps u remember versions thus u jz choose on click

3 Q:Single or agg project?

- A:Single project have no submodule, agg is short for aggregation project, its src folder might be deleted


ToggleApplicationBootstrap

- rename settings file especially using Spring Cloud Config

- toggle feature allows you play around and around

QA

- none
